data.name: Shattered Gardens
data.detailed_description:
Implemented Features

  • A beautiful world to explore.

Soon to be Implemented Features

  • More beautiful worlds to explore.
  • Many challenging enemies to fight.
  • Unlock magical spells on your adventure - These will help you defeat monsters!
  • Multiplayer mode!

Read this!

We are still fully dedicated to making Shattered Gardens the best game it can be, and the continued community feedback and support will help us achieve this. We will start to post regular updates and screenshots of our progress across all of our social media pages. Thank you everyone for your continued support.
data.about_the_game:
Implemented Features

We will start to post regular updates and screenshots of our progress across all of our social media pages. Thank you everyone for your continued support.
data.short_description: Shattered Gardens is the all-new Open-World, Fantasy RPG!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 2004 or 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300X OR Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750Ti OR AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These minimum specifications have been tested to work well on Medium settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 2004 or 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 OR Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 OR AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These recommended specifications have been tested to be the max needed to play this game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.15 or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.15 or Higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 19 or Equivalent
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300X OR Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750Ti OR AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These minimum specifications have been tested to work well on Medium settings.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 19 or Equivalent
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 OR Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 OR AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These recommended specifications have been tested to be the max needed to play this game.
